target_text: モッドパック開発者へのヒント！

source_text: §cWarning: These items may contain\n§cpossibly dangerous features!\n<+§aF4§7 for details>
target_text: §c警告：これらのアイテムには\\n§cおそらく危険な機能が含まれている可能性があります！\\n<+§aF4§7 で詳細>

source_text:
You can add simple crafting items in
§econfig/cd4017be/core.rcp§7 using: §3add("item", §4id§3, §4name§3);
§4id§7 = unique number[0...32767] for damage value.
In §een_US.lang§7 add: §3item.cd4017be.m:§4name§3.name=§7DisplayName
and optional: §3item.cd4017be.m:§4name§3.tip=§7Tooltip
and/or §3item.cd4017be.m:§4name§3.tipA=§7Secondary Tooltip
Model file = §eassets/cd4017be_lib/models/item/m/§4name§e.json
In recipe declarations use: §3it("m.§4name§3")
